plot outline: Bhadra and Bhama are identical twins. Bhadra is a nurse at a public health center and she takes care of the family. She has to look after Bhama, who is studying for MBBS and her brother Achuthankutty, who is a local politician. She also has to take care of her mother, grandmother and valiamma, who is insane. Achuthankutty's debts leads them to sell their house to Krishnakumar. To save their house, Bhadra meets Sridevi, Krishnakumar's sister...
title: Mizhi Randilum
plot: Bhadra, a nurse, has to look after her family. Due to her brother's debts, she sells her house to Krishnakumar but later, she meets Krishnakumar's sister who offers to help her get the house back.
